text: Idi gava jinike, gotine wan (jinen bajari, di mafe xwe da) bihistiye (ku ewan jinan li we digazinin u qenciyan je ra nabejin; saiyen xwe) sandiye pey wan, ji wan ra xewaneke (sifreke) bi palge u raxisti amade kiriye, ji bona her jineki ra kerek aniye. (Piri ku jin hatine runistine, jinike ji Yusuf ra aha) gotiye: "Derkebe hembere wan. "Dema ewan (jinan Yusuf) ditine, ewan (jinan Yusuf) mezin kirine u (haja ji wan nemaye, ker avetine deste xwe) deste xwe birine u gotine: "Ji bona Yezdan! Eva meriv nine. Eva hey firisteki kirnas e
